mapper.update: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS tb_stateless_transaction ( id bigint UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增编号', group_id int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT '群组编号', uuid_stateless varchar(64) NOT NULL COMMENT '合约无状态交易业务流水号', uuid_deploy varchar(64) NOT NULL COMMENT '部署交易业务流水号', contract_abi text NOT NULL COMMENT '合约abi', contract_address varchar(64) NOT NULL COMMENT '合约地址', func_name varchar(32) NOT NULL COMMENT '调用的合约方法名', func_param text COMMENT '合约方法的入参json', sign_type tinyint(4) DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '签名 类型(0-本地配置私钥，1-本地随机私钥，2-调用签名服务)', request_count tinyint(4) DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '请求次数', handle_status tinyint(4) DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '处理状态(0-待处理，1-处理成功)', trans_hash varchar(128) COMMENT '交易hash值', receipt_status varchar(16) COMMENT '交易回执状态', gmt_create datetime DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '创建时间', gmt_modify datetime DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '修改时间', PRIMARY KEY (id), UNIQUE KEY idx_gu_01 (group_id,uuid_stateless), KEY idx_gi_02 (group_id), KEY idx_ts_03 (handle_status) ) COMMENT='合约无状态交易请求信息表' ENGINE=InnoDB CHARSET=utf8
mapper.sql: id, group_id as groupId, contract_abi as contractAbi, contract_address as contractAddress, func_name as funcName, func_param as funcParam, request_count as requestCount, sign_type as signType
mapper.insert: insert into tb_stateless_transaction( `group_id`, `uuid_stateless`, `uuid_deploy`, `contract_address`, `contract_abi`, `func_name`, `func_param`, `sign_type`, `gmt_create`, `gmt_modify` ) values ( #{groupId}, #{uuidStateless}, #{uuidDeploy}, #{contractAddress}, #{contractAbi}, #{funcName}, #{funcParam}, #{signType}, NOW(), DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL 1 DAY) )
mapper.update: update tb_stateless_transaction set request_count=#{requestCount}, gmt_modify=NOW() where id = #{id}
update tb_stateless_transaction set trans_hash = #{transHash}, receipt_status = #{receiptStatus}, handle_status=1, gmt_modify=NOW() where id = #{id}
